GreetingBlock.title: Welcome to the Impex Corp car showroom
GreetingBlock.text: Impex Corp is an auto company that offers its customers a wide range of products and services related to the automotive industry. Having become a leading player in the market, Impex Corp has several key advantages that make them an ideal choice for buyers

firstBlock.title1: Security, Reliability, and Style in every detail!

AboutUs.AboutCompanyTitle: The Impex Corp company provides services for the purchase and import of cars from Korea and China!
AboutUs.AboutUsTitle: Welcome to the Impex Corp car showroom

AboutUsText.thin: is an auto company that offers its customers a wide range of products and services related to the automotive industry. Having become a leading player in the market, Impex Corp has several key advantages that make them an ideal choice for buyers.

key.thin: guarantee of your confidence in the transaction

receive.title: You are getting
receive.thin: In less than a year, our company has completed over 100 contracts with more than 7 countries and 30 cities of the CIS .

choice.thin: One of the important tasks for our company is the selection and delivery of special machinery, equipment, raw materials for the mining, light and agricultural industries. We also supply spare parts, accessories and chemicals for cars.
choice.bottom: Also, the company “IMPEX CORP” is developing in the direction of import-export of food products and tourism. The main activity of our company is the import-export of cars from countries such as China, Korea, Japan, UAE, Georgia, Europe, USA.

AboutUsBottom.title: The process of buying your car from Korea and China is very simple!
AboutUsBottom.bottomTitle: Your dream is in your hands!
